variables

x1 in [-100000000,100000000];
x2 in [-100000000,100000000];
x3 in [-100000000,100000000];
x4 in [-100000000,100000000];
x5 in [-100000000,100000000];
x6 in [-100000000,100000000];
x7 in [-100000000,100000000];
x8 in [-100000000,100000000];

minimize

-38 + x1 + x2 + 2*x3 + 2*x4 + 2*x5 - 2*x6 + x7 - x8;

end
